name: Speed Craft Runner
description:
Race along a lonely and dreamlike path that winds its way through light and mist. Each stage slowly increases in difficulty and you gradually speed up over time.

This project is an early prototype. If you enjoy it and would like to see it developed further, be sure to let me know!

Feature Wishlist
  • In-game crafting
  • Weapons
  • Dynamic enemies
  • More pickup & obstacle variety
  • Research tree
  • Branching paths
  • Teleporters
  • Special and rare path locations
  • Dynamic gravity
